adjectives.description: heterogynous (comparative more heterogynous, superlative most heterogynous)

entries.meaning: (zoology) Having females very unlike the males in form and structure.
examples: Some heterogynous insects have winged males and wingless females.

entries.meaning: (zoology) Having females of two different kinds, one sexual and the other abortive or neuter, as ants or bees.
